price: Basi mcheni Mwenyezi Mungu, na nit'iini.
footnotes: Basi ifuateni amri ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Na ikhofuni adhabu yake. Na t'iini ninayo kuamrisheni yanayo toka kwa Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
